name: SpiritBruh
description:
Wanna have some adventure with some spirits roaming around you?

If yes, Then make sure to play SpiritBruh where you have to shoot the spirits roaming around you and be safe from them too as they can kill you.

This game is made for TheGiftJam 2020. It was said to make a game for a person so I made a game for my friend IndieBruh(thats why the theme color is orange as his logo has the main color set orange)...

Controls: ArrowKeys to move, Space bar to Jump and Z key for shooting

Please give your feedback and support me to make more games like this.
